front.title: YANG Groupings for HTTP Clients and HTTP Servers

abstract.t: This document presents four YANG 1.1 modules. The 'ietf-uri' module defines a YANG 'grouping' for the URI described in Section 3 of RFC 3986. The 'ietf-http-client' module defines a YANG 'grouping' for configuring a minimal HTTP client. The 'ietf-http-server' module defines a 'grouping' for configuring a minimal HTTP server. Lastly, the 'iana-http-versions' module defines a YANG 'typedef' for HTTP protocol versions.
